attributes.action: Ensure the right of peaceful protest and repeal the policing bill
attributes.additional_details: This is staggering assault on the right to protest peacefully and is in contravention with freedom of speech.
attributes.background: Repeal the draconian crackdowns on the right of peaceful protest being enforced by the policing bill being rushed through the commons on Monday 15th March 2021.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not restrict our rights to peaceful protest: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012

Do not pass the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579242

Remove single person protest clauses in Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578875
